description.displayText:
Chiara was my student in the dance department of our high school. She is intelligent, enormously kind and compassionate. She has tremendous social skills and was well liked by her peers and faculty. Chiara is also a responsible young adult with an ability to take direction and follow through with whatever is required of her.
I recommend her enthusiastically.
